TEXT.TITLE: DINNER BELL FOODS INC <DINB.O> 1ST QTR SEPT 26
TEXT.BODY: Shr 4.41 dlrs vs seven cts Qtly div 10 cts vs 10 cts in prior qtr Net 2,955,000 vs 75,000 Sales 72.7 mln vs 70.0 mln NOTE: Net includes pre-tax gain of 7,813,0000 dlrs from termination of retirement plan for salaried employees and 875,000 dlrs charge for reorganization costs Dividend payable November 17 to holders of record November two Reuter
